ai-iti64:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti64:2.3_0: Bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-iti64:2.4_0: These are the three kinds of bad conduct.”
ai-iti64:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti64:4.3_0: when their body breaks up, that witless person
ai-iti64:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
